## ARIAGlobalStatesAndProperties.ariaCurrent property

Indicates the element that represents the current item within a container or set of related elements.

[https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/\#aria-current](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#aria-current)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ariaCurrent: "page" | "step" | "location" | "date" | "time" | "true" | "false" | string | null;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: aria-current
